column3: News;Banteay Meanchey:------ At 9:30 pm on December 2
column5: a bunch of electricity wires exploded into flames. The fire then began  to spread to the homes of residents
column6: but luckily did not cause any injury or damage.------This happened in Kbal Spean 2 Village
column9: Banteay Meanchey Province.------Police say the cause was due to the mess of cable wiring.------The authorities
column11: took fire extinguishers and fought the blaze for about 40 minutes until it was put out.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/392211------
